overview:
Kyle joined MIOX Corporation in late 2006, coming from Intel Corporation. Kyle spent 9 years in progressively more responsible manufacturing roles. Prior to Intel, he worked as a financial analyst in the investment banking division of Alex, Brown & Sons, participating in IPO, merger and acquisitions, private equity placements and business valuation projects in the insurance industry.

Kyle has an undergraduate degree from Stanford University in quantitative economics, and his MBA from the University of New Mexico.
